This works great. I actually bought it this title, however. Downloaded it for a friend. For being an indie game from a lesser-known developer, it's really quite good. A very nice mix of HL2/Deus Ex here. It could use some work to flesh out a lot of bugs (lots of random crashes, never the same crash twice for me) and to help smooth over various little details. Overall a very fun game and well worth the 17 US dollars for it.

Works fine! You can Co-op Lan easily with this one.

Co-op Lan = 1st player create server, 2nd player log into single player mode, then open console with ~, then type in "connect [1st player IP]", wait while it configures, then play. Great team game.
I keep getting a "problem connecting to tracker" error no matter what torrent of this game I try to download.  Any suggestions?
Nevermind...was only using BitTornado.  Downloaded Miro and works fine.  *Newbie*!

For LAN you need the developer console, and for me the "~"-key was not set to open it as the default setting, but if you open the file found at this location "x:/EYE/EYE/cfg/config.cfg ", and edit the line: bind "x" "toggleconsole", you can set it to what ever you want.
